entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Prévost
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:44 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
